price: 4. Hebeltô nafsi mayan malaykatti dacayrih amol kaak yanih akke waytek.
arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullu nafsin lammā ʿalayhā ḥāfiẓun
